name: Earth2Mars
description:
GAMEPLAY
Direct your colonists from Earth to Mars by  drawing a path for each rocket ship. The clock is ticking but watch out for asteroids and ship to ship collisions!  Don't panic - paths can be recreated mid-flight.

PROGRAMMING
Adam Parkinson
René Monteiro

ART
Rosa Hughes & Stable Diffusion

SOUND & MUSIC
Pixabay & Mubert
